funds.description: List of all conversion funds with their base token equivalents

round_id.description: The round ID used for ratio calculations

total_base_token_equivalent.description: Total base token equivalent across all denoms (sum of all base_token_equivalent values)

ConversionFundInfo.description: Information about available conversion funds for a single token denom.

amount.description: The raw amount of tokens available for conversion

base_token_equivalent.description: The base token equivalent of the amount (amount * ratio), truncated to nearest integer. Will be Uint128::zero() if ratio is zero.

ratio.description: The ratio of this token to base token for the given round. Will be Decimal::zero() if the token info provider doesn't recognize the denom.

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
